title: The Hangman Collection 1941-1944 Complete MLJ
description:
After reading DC's Mighty Crusdaers Mini series and seeing how they portrayed The Hangman, I started grabbing all his books and here they are for you to enjoy!

Golden Age Origin 
Bob Dickering had a brother named John who was the superhero Comet. However when Bob's brother was shot when he tried to save Bob from "Big Boy" Malone's gang, He would become the hero Hangman to avenge his brother's death. He also would go on to date his brother's ex-girlfriend, Thelma Gordon.

His enemies included the Bullfrog, the Jackal, Captain Swastika, the Crusader, the Executioner, the Hunter, the Missionary, Mother Goose, the Snail and the Walrus.

Golden Age Appearances  
Pep Comics #17-47
Special Comics #1
Hangman Comics #2-8
Black Hood Comics #9-10

Real Name

Bob Dickering

First Appearance

Pep Comics #17 (July, 1941)

Original Publisher

MLJ

Created by

Cliff Campbell and George Storm

NOTE:  MANY OF THE HANGMAN STORIES ARE GRAPHIC IN NATURE AND NOT FOR EVERYONE!!!!
